Fraud Detection

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651062831129{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}»]

Use Machine Learning to identify fraudulent clients or transactions.

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»large» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Accent-Color» solid_text_color_override=»#0a0a0a» icon_family=»none» url=»https://www.rockingdata.com.ar/contact» text=»I want more info» margin_top=»40″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» equal_height=»yes» content_placement=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_color=»#ffffff» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» top_padding=»2%» bottom_padding=»4%» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none» enable_animation=»true» animation=»fade-in-from-bottom» delay=»200″][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651062848951{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}»]

Minimize fraud losses.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our model analyzes historical behavior, customer characteristics and transactions to identify patterns that indicate possible fraud.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» top_margin=»-10″ width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none» enable_animation=»true» animation=»grow-in» delay=»200″][image_with_animation image_url=»941″ alignment=»center» animation=»Fade In» hover_animation=»none» border_radius=»none» box_shadow=»none» image_loading=»default» max_width=»100%» max_width_mobile=»default»][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_color=»#ededed» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» top_padding=»4%» bottom_padding=»4%» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

For what?

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Identify the highest proportion of existing fraud
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651062978668{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Prioritize the cases to be analyzed in search of fraud
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651062985752{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Automate constant surveillance in search of fraud.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651062992122{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Accelerate the analysis time of each case
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

Expected results

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Reduce fraud losses.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651063016242{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Increase effectiveness in fraud detection.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651063022805{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Reduce the costs associated with fraud detection.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

Business Cases

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Fraud prediction of:
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651063117693{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}»]
  • Sales transactions 
  • Customer registration 
  • Unsubscribe from customers 
  • Claims
